• 3 cups of plain flour
  • 1 cup of salt
  • 1 tablespoon of cooking oil
  • 1 cup of water
  • Rolling pin
  • Blunt knife
  • Pastry cutters
  • Baking tray
  • Tablespoon
  • Wooden spoon
  • Bowl
  • Cup
  • Foil
  • Paint
  • PVA glue (children's glue)

Mix together the plain flour and salt. Add the water and oil. Knead the dough until it is elastic.

Use the cutters to make a variety of shapes, and then place on a baking tray lined with foil. Bake in the oven (150°C/300°/Gas mark 2) for about 40 minutes. Turn them over after 20 minutes to ensure that both sides are cooked.

When they have colled the shapes can be painted. When dry, varnish using PVA glue which will dry clear.
